snippet.title: A Wolf In Sheep's Clothing: Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
A gameplay trailer for my new visual novel (and first game), A Wolf In Sheep's Clothing. Took me around 3 months to make. I hope you all enjoy it!

Download: https://harlequinngames.itch.io/a-wolf-in-sheeps-clothing
